project.description: This Job will use the BNG utility to genrate the build notes and share it by mail

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Build Version to be used the report default name and the email

secureScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

secureFallbackScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tStream
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Target stream to gather the changes from or to compare to. As :Archer_17.12_Integ or Archer_17.04_Integ

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sStream
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Source stream to compare with. As :Archer_17.12_Dev or Archer_17.04_Dev
If empty: compare will be done on the target stream only with latest changes against last snapshot there.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ReportName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The relevant name of the generated report

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: recipientList
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: comma seperated list of emails to get the generated build notes. As Adham.Saffori@kla-tencor.com Or groups of mails seperated by comma.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: CopyToShare
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Copy Build notes to Share folder, as \\isr1fp04\OMD_InternalBuildNotes\V17.12

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
::@Echo off set cmd_suffix="" if NOT "%sStream%"=="" set cmd_suffix=-s %sStream%
java -Dhttp.proxyHost=isr1vmrtcproxy01.kla-tencor.com -Dhttp.proxyPort=3128 -jar "%BNG_PATH%\BNG.jar" -acf "%BNG_PATH%\Attributeconfig.xml" -grf %Format% -r %repositoryAddress% -u %BuildUser% -p "%BuildPass%" -pa "OMD NuArcher" -rf %ReportName% -rp "%WORKSPACE%" -tsw %tStream% %cmd_suffix% IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" =="0" Exit /b 1
echo Copy=%CopyToShare%
IF "%CopyToShare%"=="true" ( IF exist "%WORKSPACE%\%ReportName%.%Format%" ( xcopy "%WORKSPACE%\%ReportName%.%Format%" \\isr1fp04\OMD_InternalBuildNotes\V%MajorMinor_Ver%\ ) IF NOT "%ERRORLEVEL%" =="0" ( Echo "Failed to copy Build notes: '%WORKSPACE%\%ReportName%' to network folder: '\\isr1fp04\OMD_InternalBuildNotes\V%MajorMinor_Ver%' Exit /b 1 ) )

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
Build ${BUILD_VERSION} is ready for build . Build notes attached
For CSV build notes, to autoFit columns and rows:
    Open the file and press the following keyboard shortcuts:
         > To AutoFit column width: Alt + H, then O, and then I
         > To AutoFit row height: Alt + H, then O, and then A
